about_the_game:
The Insider is a violent action where you play as an undercover cop who infiltrates a criminal gang under the guise of a street thug to investigate and carry out missions to capture the crime ring leader. In addition to the dangerous and bloody purges between rival gangs, the protagonist must also deal with the risky and challenging task of concealing his true identity. Will he be able to overcome the suspicions of the criminals and continue fulfilling his role as a police officer to overthrow and capture the gang leader, or will he be forced into daring escapes as his cover begins to unravel?


Setting:
In a society rife with traps and the dominance of criminal gangs fighting for territory and expansion, brutal battles are increasingly common. Government agencies require effective measures to tighten control by infiltrating these gangs to investigate and gather legal evidence with the ultimate goal of capturing and dismantling their operations.

Features:
The game offers a wide variety of weapons and combat mechanics. Whether you prefer hand-to-hand combat or using weapons like guns, machetes, pool cues, and knives to take down enemies, our goal is to make the gameplay dynamic with many weapon choices and exciting melee combat mechanics.

Additionally, the game includes intense encounters with various bosses. Each boss has unique weapons and distinct combat mechanics. They possess basic defensive skills as well as special martial arts techniques exclusive to each boss, creating significant challenges for the protagonist. These epic battles not only showcase martial arts skills but also require quick and challenging gameplay from the player.



Beyond the fierce life-or-death battles, the game also tells an emotional story about the protagonist's journey to protect his identity and his family from deadly dangers. He must navigate the moral boundaries between good and evil. Distorted emotions and paradoxes arise, along with unresolved questions about his journey. Will he be able to keep his family safe, or will they be targeted by enemies? Will he fight through and survive?

content_descriptors.notes: The game may contain content not suitable for all ages, or not appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent violence or gore, adult content.
